column4: Hey, i have downloaded a ZIP file, and i need to install it (its to my icons) but how do i do that, i have tried a lot fo things, but i simply cant figure it out :( , anybody there want to help me :( ?
install and use the unzip command?
But how do i do that :( ?
hmmm.. 'unzip foo.zip' perhaps.. or check the man pages with man unzip ,
okay i try something
these are windows icons? or what exactly?
Well, i have opened the zip file, but its for my icons, so how do i install it now ?
Yes, cool icons for my icons :)
you realize that linux dosent really USE .ico files? You may need to convert them to png.
there are tools to convert them
It is PNG files, all off then.
But how do i install the theme for my icons.
so use them then.. they are not a gnome theme.. so yiu just use them as if they were normal images.. OR are they a gnome icon theme>
yes it is
it is a gnome icon theme.
yoi did NOT need to extract them.. and  why are they .zip ed?
you can insall nome theme parts by just drag/dropping the file onto the gnome appearancess contril-panel window.
okay, but i still got the zip folder ..
you mean its a .zip FILE or a .tar.gz file?
Hm .. i think i understand what you meant there, i try
your use of the term zip - may be wrong.
its a ZIP file :)
no idea on tha tthen.. linux dosent normally use .zips that tool may or may not know wha tto do with them
hm alright, but thanks for your help anyway :)
